name: Knockoff Batman
description:
Batman is back ready to save Gotham City from Bane and Joker who resently broke out of Arkahm Asylum.

As Batman you can pick up Health Kits which will give you 1 extra heart. Villians and Drones take 1 Heart from you, but only take 1 Batarang to kill. Ninjas take 4 Batarangs to kill and if you get hit by one they take 2 Hearts  away. Joker has 12 Hearts and takes 2 hearts from you when hit but he will also throw you. Also Bane has 20 hearts and will instantly kill you. The Generator will kill all the drones and the Gas Tank will explode if you throw a Batarang at it. The Spikes will launch you in the air and take 1 Heart away. You can break from Cardboard only. Finally you get 4 Batarangs and once you use them up they will reload in a few seconds.
